# BASH

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.sh`
  - `.bash`
  - `.dash`
  - `.ksh`

## Mega-linter configuration

| Variable | Description | Default value |
| ----------------- | -------------- | -------------- |
| BASH_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |  |
| BASH_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |  |
